rules_text:
Artifact creatures you control have modular 2. [i](This creature enters with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)[/i]
Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control attack, return up to one target artifact, instant, or sorcery card to your hand from your graveyard with mana value less than or equal to the greatest power among attacking artifact creatures you control.
